title: F/S:  1912 T202 Hassan Triple Folder Just Before The Battle McGraw & Jennings
author: jasonemil

posts.post_title: F/S:  1912 T202 Hassan Triple Folder Just Before The Battle McGraw & Jennings
posts.post_content:
**** SOLD ****

This card has a nice front but there is some paper loss on the rear.  There is a small wrinkle in the card below McGraw's nose but isn't noticeable unless you look at it from an angle.
